ThingDef.label: S nutrient paste vat
ThingDef.description: An S size tank that can store up to 45 nutrient paste meals in it. Makes a big mess when destroyed.

ThingDef.label: L nutrient paste vat
ThingDef.description: An L size tank that can store up to 1215 nutrient paste meals in it. Makes a big mess when destroyed.

ThingDef.label: XL nutrient paste vat
ThingDef.description: An XL size tank that can store up to 2880 nutrient paste meals in it. Makes a big mess when destroyed.

ThingDef.label: XXL nutrient paste vat
ThingDef.description: An XXL size tank that can store up to 5625 nutrient paste meals in it. Makes a big mess when destroyed.

ThingDef.label: toxic waste pipe
ThingDef.description: Steel pipes designed to transport usable toxic waste for storage or to toxic waste-consuming structures for automatic refilling.

ThingDef.label: subterranean toxic waste pipe
ThingDef.description: Subterranean steel pipes designed to transport usable toxic waste to tanks for storage or to toxic waste-consuming structures for automatic refilling.

ThingDef.label: toxic waste valve
ThingDef.description: Switches toxic waste flow on/off.

ThingDef.label: toxic waste tank
ThingDef.description: An industrial liquid storage tank meant for storing toxic waste delivered via toxic waste pipe network. It requires power. When unpowered and filled, will take damage and cause a toxic fallout on destruction. Tanks can be designated to be siphoned for usable toxic waste as needed. If damaged even lightly the escaping fumes will very swiftly create a gaseous toxic fireball, the size of the resulting explosion will depend on the amount stored within.

ThingDef.label: toxic waste tap
ThingDef.description: A hopper-like storage basin meant to hold dispensed toxic waste from tanks periodically for use later.

ThingDef.label: toxic waste drain
ThingDef.description: A hopper-like storage basin meant to input toxic waste into the network, filling up connected tanks.

ThingDef.label: waste detofixier
ThingDef.description: Consumes power to destroy wastepacks.

ThingDef.label: Stationary RTG
ThingDef.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator (RTG) is a type of generator that generate electricity by the Seebeck effect, which has no moving parts so it won't breakdown.

ThingDef.label: Portable RTG
ThingDef.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator (RTG) is a type of generator that generate electricity by the Seebeck effect, which has no moving parts so it won't breakdown.

ThingDef.label: Energy cell
ThingDef.description: Net output: +2,600W A sci-fi power gizmo from the Peppermint-Sprinkler Nebula

ThingDef.label: Energy chamber
ThingDef.description: Net output: +6,100W A specialized environment designed to improve the smaller generator's power output.

ThingDef.label: Energy manifold
ThingDef.description: Net output: +19,500W A large machine that generates power from liquid science.

ThingDef.label: Jade generator
ThingDef.description: Net output: +1,000W If you've ever walked past a big air conditioning unit in real life, you know just how much it sucks to stand near one of these.

ThingDef.label: Jade generator long
ThingDef.description: Net output: +1,550W If you've ever walked past a bigger air conditioning unit in real life, you know just how much it sucks to stand near one of these.

ThingDef.label: Jade generator industrial
ThingDef.description: Net output: +2,450W If you've ever walked past a super big air conditioning unit in real life, you know just how much it sucks to stand near one of these.

ThingDef.label: large helixien gas smithy
ThingDef.description: A gas-powered work center for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools. Consumes a lot of gas.

ThingDef.label: large helixien gas stove
ThingDef.description: A large size gas-powered manufacturing stove as well as multiple ovens to prepare meals and cook significantly faster.

ThingDef.label: advanced multi-analyzer
ThingDef.description: Greatly increases research speed (+25%) when placed near a research bench.\nOne research bench can only be connected to one advanced multi-analyzer but can still be connected to the normal multi-analyzer.

ThingDef.label: improved cabinet
ThingDef.description: Increases work speed (+10%) when placed near a workbench.\nOne workbench can only be connected to one improved tool cabinet but can still be connected to other types of cabinets.

ThingDef.label: mechanic cabinet
ThingDef.description: Greatly increases work speed (+15%) when placed near a workbench.\nOne workbench can only be connected to one mechanic tool cabinet but can still be connected to other types of cabinets.

ThingDef.label: scientist cabinet
ThingDef.description: Greatly increases work speed (+30%) when placed near a workbench and slightly increases research speed (+5%) when placed near a research bench.\nOne workbench/research bench can only be connected to one scientist tool cabinet but can still be connected to other types of cabinets.

ThingDef.label: kitchen cupboard
ThingDef.description: Increases cooking and butchering speed (+7.5%) when placed near a stove/butcher table.\nA maximum of two cupboards can be connected to a workbench.

ThingDef.label: surgical lamp
ThingDef.description: Increases surgery success chance (+10%), and immunity gain speed (+1%) when placed directly adjacent to a hospital bed. Only works for hospital beds - normal beds will not benefit. Attaching more than one surgical lamp to the same bed will have no effect.

ThingDef.label: surgical instruments
ThingDef.description: Increases medical tend quality (+10%), and immunity gain speed (+1%) when placed directly adjacent to a hospital bed. Only works for hospital beds - normal beds will not benefit. Attaching more than one surgical instruments to the same bed will have no effect.

ThingDef.label: primitive stone cutting spot
ThingDef.description: A place to bang large rocks together to make smaller rocks.

ThingDef.label: animal totem
ThingDef.description: A tall artistic carving depicting the spiritual connection between primitve humans and their free-range desires and animal nature.

ThingDef.label: insect totem
ThingDef.description: A tall artistic carving depicting the spiritual connection between primitve humans and their hive-mind desire to achieve collective progress and survival.

ThingDef.label: animal wisdom totem
ThingDef.description: A tall artistic carving depicting some of the most revered and respected animals on The Rim.

ThingDef.label: stone waste bin
ThingDef.description: A stone pot for waste disposal. They take less work to make than a storage pot and do not have an art component.

ThingDef.label: woven waste bin
ThingDef.description: A woven basket for waste disposal. They take less work to make than a storage basket and do not have an art component.

ThingDef.label: primitive crafting table
ThingDef.description: A stone bench for crafting simple items like knives or bows. Along with a few simple tools, this bench is more efficient than a spot of flat ground.

ThingDef.label: stone butcher table
ThingDef.description: A slab of stone for butchering animals. Along with a few simple tools, this bench is more efficient than a spot of flat ground.

ThingDef.label: stone kiln(H)
ThingDef.description: A stone Kiln for producing pottery, ceramics, and adobe.

ThingDef.label: primitive tailoring table
ThingDef.description: A stone slab with primitive tools for weaving primtive clothing.

ThingDef.label: masonry table
ThingDef.description: A table with primitive tools for breaking rocks into blocks.

ThingDef.label: herbalist and spirit making table
ThingDef.description: A table for concocting spirits and medicines.

ThingDef.label: melee weapon bench
ThingDef.description: A table for forging basic weapons and tools.

ThingDef.label: ranged weapon bench
ThingDef.description: A table for making ranged weapons.

ThingDef.Name: VBY_PrimitiveResearchTableBase
ThingDef.label: primitive research table
ThingDef.description: A slab of rock and a collection of interesting things to study and observe.

ThingDef.label: primitive research spot
ThingDef.description: A place to ponder the blueprints of the world.

ThingDef.label: primitive tool table
ThingDef.description: Increases work speed when placed near a workbench. One workbench may use to up to two tool tables.

ThingDef.label: primitive tablet table
ThingDef.description: Increases research speed when placed near a primitive research spot or table. Each research bench or spot can only use one tablet table.

ThingDef.label: metallurgy table
ThingDef.description: A stone bench and firepit for heating metal beyond it's melting point to be hammered, formed, and molded into tools and weapons.

ThingDef.label: primitive loom
ThingDef.description: A wooden structure used to produce woven fabric.

ThingDef.label: hay bed
ThingDef.description: Bedding made from hay. It's soft...ish and kinda pokey.

ThingDef.label: leather bed
ThingDef.description: A bed made from stretched leather over a wooden frame. It beats sleeping on the ground.

ThingDef.label: double hay bed
ThingDef.description: Bedding made from hay. It's soft...ish and kinda pokey. Big enough for two.

ThingDef.label: double leather bed
ThingDef.description: A bed made from stretched leather over a wooden frame. It beats sleeping on the ground. Big enough for two.

ThingDef.label: 3-person hay bed
ThingDef.description: Bedding made from hay. It's soft...ish and kinda pokey. Big enough for three.

ThingDef.label: 3-person leather bed
ThingDef.description: A bed made from stretched leather over a wooden frame. It beats sleeping on the ground. Big enough for three.

ThingDef.label: primitive hay crib
ThingDef.description: A crib made from hay. It's soft...ish and kinda pokey. The perfect size for a wee pawn.

ThingDef.label: small ceramic vase
ThingDef.description: A kiln-fired vase.

ThingDef.label: medium ceramic vase
ThingDef.description: A kiln-fired vase.

ThingDef.label: hay door
ThingDef.description: A simple wodden frame covered with thatched hay.

ThingDef.label: hay wall
ThingDef.description: A basic wodden frame covered in thatched hay.

ThingDef.label: neolithic manager spot
ThingDef.description: A spot of ground perfect for planning work tasks for the colony. There's nothing here to keep track of progress so it's easy for the manager to forget or overlook things.

ThingDef.label: stone manager bench
ThingDef.description: A flattened stone used for managing colony tasks more efficiantly. It's still quite basic, yet, with a bundle of twigs and some pebbles, the flat surface allows the manger to visualize daily plans.

ThingDef.label: primitive styling station
ThingDef.description: A table with a mirror made from polished stone and basic flint styling tools. People can use this to change their look.

ThingDef.label: bone totem
ThingDef.description: A tall artistic statue constructed of bones. Do you recognize anyone?
